results.name: default/wordpress-799489f4b-4n24v

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-799489f4b-hh8gr Pod/wordpress-799489f4b-4n24v Pod/wordpress-799489f4b-9qfxr], expected 3

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints; 3 pods are expected but not all are ready.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect logs with `kubectl logs [pod-name]`. 3. Verify pod readiness probes. 4. Ensure pods are running without errors. 5. Restart pods if necessary.
